text.text: back to this Awesome cafe bar after 5 years, and I’m so glad I did! The food is still absolutely delicious, with every dish prepared to perfection. The flavors are vibrant and fresh – it’s clear they use high-quality ingredients. The service has also remained top-notch; the staff is friendly, attentive, and made me feel right at home. It’s a wonderful spot to relax and enjoy great food. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a welcoming place with fantastic eats and service. This place holds a special place in my heart as a beautiful memory of my time in Singapore. I’ll definitely be back again soon!！！！

This place holds a special place in my heart as a beautiful memory of my time in Singapore. I’ll definitely be back again soon!！！！

text.text: This cafe is seriously the cutest place I've ever been, like, ever. 🥰😍🤩  The fairy lights and comfy chairs just make you want to stay all day. 🛋️✨💖  And the food?  Don't even get me started. 😋🤤💯  I had the most amazing Quesadilla, it was pure heaven. 🧀🔥🌟 Every bite was a flavor explosion, honestly. 💥😋🤯 The Pork Porchetta was just out of this world. 🐷🌎😋 The coffee was rich and smooth, the perfect pick-me-up. ☕😌👍  I even grabbed a pineapple upside-down cake, it is tooo die for !! 🍍🍰😋 I can't wait to go back and try everything else on the menu. 🤤🍽️😋  This place is my new favorite spot, hands down. 💯🥇💖 The owner and everyone there will go out of their way to help you out pick what would be best for you. 😇🙏💖 They also help taking photos you and your group ;) 📸😊👍

text.text:
I can't recommend Awesome Cafe enough! The food was absolutely delicious, and the service was impeccable. We hosted a private event here, and the team went above and beyond with thoughtful arrangements and beautiful decorations that made the occasion even more special. Everything was handled with so much care and attention to detail.

A huge thank you to the entire team for making it such a memorable experience for us and our guests. Truly a place that lives up to its name—totally awesome! We'll definitely be back.

originalText.text:

We hosted a private event here, and the team went above and beyond with thoughtful arrangements and beautiful decorations that made the occasion even more special. A huge thank you to the entire team for making it such a memorable experience for us and our guests. Truly a place that lives up to its name—totally awesome! We'll definitely be back.

text.text:
Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5)

My Awesome Cafe stands out not just for its eclectic decor and charming location along Telok Ayer Street, but also for its warm, lived-in atmosphere. Housed in a heritage shophouse, it gives off a nostalgic, artsy vibe — a place that feels both casual and characterful. It was pretty packed on a Saturday afternoon, so don’t come expecting quiet.

The potato-crust pizza (pozza) was a highlight — crisp, flavourful, and something different.
The prawn curry didn’t quite hit the mark for me; it was serviceable but lacked the punch I hoped for.
The pulled beef burger had great-tasting beef, but the brioche bun was a bit too much, throwing off the balance a little.

What really stood out, though, was the service. One of the staff members was especially genuine — very honest in her recommendations and open about what she personally liked. I appreciated her sincerity and energy — it added a lot to the experience and made the space feel even more welcoming.

A cool spot with a few creative food twists and a human touch in service. I’d come back for the pozza and the vibe.

text.text:
Sorry to say it, but the food didn’t meet my expectations. Burger is not a burger, but three layers of brioche with kind of pate between it. All food is very oily.
The selection of beer and other drinks is not enough for a bar, but it’s too loud and dark for a restaurant.
However the service was perfect, drink and food come fast and portions are HUGE.
There are vegetarian options available as well. The location is great too.
